page.title: 20Kirklevington Detention Ctre
page.content: Her Majesty's Detention Centre lies just south of Yarm near Kirklevington. It is set in its own grounds and is surrounded by an 18 foot fence.It is the{largest centre in Britain}and can accommodate 150 boys between the ages of 14 and 17.It has been a centre for 21 years and a school for 19. The sentences are between 3 weeks and 4 months for stealing,attacks on people and a lot more.A boy would be sent there for his third{offence. The boys do work,schooling,cooking P.E. every day and have a shower every day. Mr.Campbell is in charge there and has been there since it opened. There is a tuck shop and a boy is given money which he may spend.Parents are allowed to visit every Wednesday if the boy has been good.
